Line:
???: Hey! Wake up $player_name!
???:There we go... You were out for a while y'know?
???:Huh? Why are you looking at me like that?
???:Hey it's me Arthas!
Arthas: Oh jeez! I guess you took the fall pretty hard. I think you need to drink a health potion.
Arthas: Look do .merchant and buy a health potion and drink it with (.use health potion) yeah?
Arthas: When done come back to me by doing .story !
